footer.description: Learn more about the tech specs of the project:
footer.aboutModal:
CV Fitter is an open-source project designed to help job seekers optimize their CVs for modern recruitment processes. The platform leverages advanced AI models to analyze, enhance, and reformat CVs to increase the chances of passing automated screening systems (ATS).

Our goal is to make professional CV improvement accessible to everyone, regardless of their technical background. We do not store or share your personal data. All processing is done securely and only for the duration of your session.

The project is built using React for the frontend and Python (Flask) for the backend, with integration to OpenAI models for CV enhancement. You can find the source code and contribute on GitHub.
footer.privacyModal:
CV Fitter does not store, share, or sell any of your personal data. All CV files and information you upload are processed only in-memory and are never saved on our servers.

However, the enhancement process is powered by OpenAI models, which means your CV data is sent to OpenAI's API for analysis and improvement. While OpenAI has strict privacy and security policies, we recommend reviewing their privacy policy for more details: https://openai.com/policies/privacy-policy.

By using CV Fitter, you acknowledge that your CV data will be processed by OpenAI's models solely for the purpose of providing you with an enhanced CV.

hero.title: Enhance Your CV For Better Job Opportunities
hero.description2: We analyze your CV, enhance it to match the job requirements, and transform it into the Harvard style, the most recommended format to pass company ATS screenings.

cvEnhancer.title: Enhance Your CV
cvEnhancer.aiModelTooltip: Selecting a model may produce different responses, but all are designed to help you get a CV that passes ATS systems.
cvEnhancer.uploadText: Click to upload or drag and drop your CV file
